title: yamanelyo kANenendu
sahitya:
yamanelyo kANenendu hELabEDa


anupallavi

  yamanE ramacandra sandEha bEDa


caraNam 1    nambida vibhISaNage rAmanAda nambadidda rAvaNanige yamane Ada
    caraNam 2    nambida arjunanige baNTanAda nambadidda kauravanige kaNTakanAda
    caraNam 3    nambida ugrasEnanige mitranAda nambadidda kamsanige shatruvAda
    caraNam 4    nambida bAlakanige hariyAda nambadidda avana pitage ariyAda
    caraNam 5    nambidavara salahuva namma doreyu ambujAkSa purandara viTTalarAya
